member.name: ID3D12VideoProcessor.GetInputStreamDescs
member.summary: Gets the input stream descriptions provided when the video processor was created with a call to .
member.param: The size of the array pointed to by pInputStreamDescs. Get the number of input stream descriptions associated with the video processor by calling .
An array of structures that is populated with the input stream descriptions associated with the video processor.

member.name: ID3D12VideoProcessor.GetNodeMask
member.summary: The node mask specifying the physical adapter on which the video processor will be used.

member.name: ID3D12VideoProcessor.GetNumInputStreamDescs
member.summary: Gets the number of input stream descriptions provided when the video processor was created with a call to .
member.returns: This method returns UINT. Use this value to determine the correct size of the array you pass in the pInputStreamDescs parameter to .

member.name: ID3D12VideoProcessor.GetOutputStreamDesc
member.summary: Gets the output stream description provided when the video processor was created with a call to .

member.name: ID3D12VideoProcessor
member.summary: Provides methods for getting information about the parameters to the call to that created the video processor.
